banner.subtitle: Do you want to find out how strong your relationship is or measure the interest of someone you like? Discover our fun-filled test and find out your love percentage now!
banner.title: We've Designed the Most Fun Way to Discover Love Just for You!

first_card.title: Fun and Easy
first_card.desc: No need for complex analyses. Just answer the questions and get the result.

second_card.title: What’s Your Love Percentage?
second_card.desc: With AI-powered analysis, find out how interested your partner or crush is in you, expressed as a percentage.

third_card.title: Tests for All Ages
third_card.desc: Whether you’re 19, 30, or 64, enjoy customized questions tailored to your age and relationship status.

fourth_card.title: Available on Mobile and Web
fourth_card.desc: Take your test on any device and share the result with your friends!
